message: Let's start with a fair, but slightly advantageous split for me. I'm confident we can work out a better deal later if you want.
Your offer was quite cheeky!  Let's be more realistic. This is a much fairer starting point considering time is money.
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. Let's split it 60/40,  a bit closer to my initial proposal.  We both have time to make a deal, and there's no need to rush.
This back and forth is a waste of time, let's find a middle ground.  I'm still being generous, considering the clock is ticking.
Let's meet in the middle. I'm willing to concede a bit more, but I believe 55/45 is a fair compromise given the circumstances.  We're both losing money with every round, so let's get this settled.
